attributes.action: Bring in a change of rules for cyclists by stricter policing.
attributes.additional_details:
More and more cyclists are damaging cars, injuring and even killing pedestrians and there is no way to trace who they are to prosecute.

They put themselves and others in danger daily by undertaking traffic, riding on paths, not stopping at lights etc.

It will also help with crime involving cycles as any un-registered cycles will become a target to be stopped by the police.
attributes.background:
Bring in compulsory registration plating and insurance for any cyclists that intend to use public roads or cycle paths, including the use of footpaths.

Police cyclist more with fines for jumping lights, not stopping at zebra crossings, using a road where a cycle path is available etc

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Introduce testing, tax and vehicle registration/MOT requirements for cyclists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217

Decisions about enforcement of road traffic offences are a matter for individual police forces, not the UK Government or Parliament.
